Name: Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale
About the game: *THIS GAME REQUIRES AT LEAST ONE CONTROLLER* Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale is a local split-screen co-op game where a girl and her fluffy corgi go on an adventure to find her lost grandpa. In order to find her grandpa, Kika has to look for clues that grandpa left behind. In this game, one player plays as the girl and the other as the corgi. In this adventure, you will find many obstacles and different level settings in order to unite yourself with grandpa again. To solve the mystery, teamwork is essential. Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale focuses on teamwork in order for the players to progress through the levels. Both players have different abilities that will help to solve the mystery. Kika Use her umbrella as a trampoline in order to help Daigo reach new heights Turn & twist in order to get the right combinations Wanna climb ladders? We got them! Daigo Pee & poop on everything. EVERYTHING Give items to Kika to help you out! Use the dog treats to go faster than ever before Please note: there is no 'single player' version of this game, Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale is specifically designed to be played by two players locally.
